channel.title: Transporting people to the Dummys place
channel.description: Ok, My server's base is Pk-Scape and i've edited a little bit. Anyway, I just wanted to know how to transport NPC's to the dummys place. Say Louie Legs like in SvenScape. Can anyone help me on this?

item.title: Transporting people to the Dummys place
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

you have to use autospawn.cfg to put in an NPC ID which is found in NPC.cfg, once you put in the NPC ID, you put in the coords, and the range from where it walks, etc etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Transporting people to the Dummys place

item.title: Transporting people to the Dummys place

item.description:

Ah, ok thanks man.
